tasks.title: Run prerequisites check script
tasks.description: Execute .specify/scripts/bash/check-prerequisites.sh --json --require-tasks --include-tasks and parse FEATURE_DIR and AVAILABLE_DOCS. All paths absolute.

tasks.title: Check checklists status
tasks.description: If feature checklists exist, compute table of totals/completed/incomplete and stop if incomplete (ask user).

tasks.title: Load implementation context
tasks.description: Read tasks.md, plan.md, docs/Tech-Stack.md, docs/Feature-Roadmap.md and optional data-model, contracts, research, quickstart files under feature directory.

tasks.title: Verify project ignore files
tasks.description: Check/create .gitignore, .dockerignore, .eslintignore, .prettierignore etc. based on repo content and plan.md.

tasks.title: Parse tasks.md and build execution plan
tasks.description: Extract phases, dependencies, task details and execution flow from tasks.md.

tasks.title: Execute implementation tasks (TDD-first)
tasks.description: Run phases: Setup, Tests, Core, Integration, Polish. Write tests then implementation, commit after each task.

tasks.title: Run validations and Codacy analysis
tasks.description: Run lint/type/tests and run codacy_cli_analyze for each modified file as required by codacy.instructions.md.

tasks.title: Prepare PR
tasks.description: Create a clean PR with conventional commit messages, include closing issue reference and PR body checklist.
